data.title: Reshmi and Amit plan a grand wedding
data.meta_description: Reshmi Ghosh and beau Amit Gupta who are currently seen in Nach Baliye 4 are enjoying the best time of their five year old relationship. The actress who shot to fame as Bhoomi in Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi is enjoying every minute of her relationship with Amit and is keen on getting married with him as soon as possible. | Tellychakkar.com
data.text: Reshmi Ghosh and beau Amit Gupta who are currently seen in Nach Baliye 4 are enjoying the best time of their five year old relationship. The actress who shot to fame as Bhoomi in Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi is enjoying every minute of her relationship with Amit and is keen on getting married with him as soon as possible. Submitted by TellychakkarTeam on Mon, 11/24/2008 - 17:30 Reshmi Ghosh and beau Amit Gupta who are currently seen in Nach Baliye 4 are enjoying the best time of their five year old relationship. The actress who shot to fame as Bhoomi in Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi is enjoying every minute of her relationship with Amit and is keen on getting married with him as soon as possible. The actress reveals, “We will be completing five years of togetherness on the 22nd of December this year. It’s been five years since we are planning to get married and I just hope that it happens soon. I am hoping to get married after Nach Baliye ends.” So what kind of a marriage have they planned? Reshmi says, “It will be a grand event and it will be a mix of both the traditions- Bengali (hers) and Marwari (his).” The couple first met each other at Namit Kapoor’s acting school, where they were taking lessons in acting and since then the relationship deepened. Now that they have been together for quite a long time it indeed is the right time to legalise it.
